item.title: Currently Reading
item.description: Here are some of the books I’m currently reading, unlike some perfect human beings, I am constantly switching between books on different topics, as a result I generally have about 10 unfinished books.

item.title: Obsidian Tips and Tricks
item.description: Editor [!TIP]- To fix ordered list not updating in live preview or editing mode Press “Shift+Tab” [!TIP]- To bring back last closed page Press “Ctrl+Shift+T”
